test_scenarios.name: Verify Homepage Load and Basic Search
steps: Verify the page loads successfully and essential elements like the search bar and header are visible.
Enter 'handmade jewelry' in the search bar and click the search icon.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Search results page for 'handmade jewelry' is displayed with relevant products.

test_scenarios.name: Purchase a Single Product
steps: Navigate to etsy.com and search for 'handmade jewelry'
Click on a product from the search results.
On the product details page, click 'Add to Cart'.
Click 'View Cart' to proceed to the cart page.
Enter valid shipping address and contact information.
Select a payment method (e.g., credit card) and enter valid payment details.
Review the order and click 'Place your order'.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Order confirmation page is displayed, and an order confirmation email is received.
